page.title: 01The Hoyland Common area.
page.content: Our area contains four distinct but related communities.These are Hoyland Common;Birdwell;Tankersley;and Pilley. They surrounding countryside is a peculiar mix of the rural and the industrial. Hoyland Common is part of a continuous development which includes Hoyland and Elsecar.It has many services and both old and new housing developments.Most of its inhabitants work in either Barnsley or Sheffield. Birdwell is a sizable village, originallly a ribbon development,on the main Sheffield - Barnsley road.Again most of its residents work elsewhere. Pilley and Tankersley are small mining villages,although the mines they served are now closed down.Close by a new industrial estate,the Wentworth Estate has been built.
